news_header: Mettler-Toledo reported a revenue increase of 11.8% for Q4 2024, with EPS of $12.41, surpassing expectations.
news_original_title: Compared to Estimates, Mettler-Toledo (MTD) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
news_text: Mettler-Toledo (MTD) achieved $1.05 billion in revenue for the quarter ending December 2024, marking an 11.8% year-over-year increase. The EPS of $12.41 exceeded last year's $9.40 and surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $11.69. The company also reported a revenue surprise of +3.51%. The growing demand for electricity and a global commitment to triple nuclear energy capacities could lead to significant profits for nuclear-related stocks, as highlighted in the report 'Atomic Opportunity: Nuclear Energy's Comeback'.
